text: Jade Court Sentinel, a figure of solemn dignity imbued with the heroic spirits of Cathay’s bravest generals. Even in death, they stand as ghostly champions, defying all who challenge their might.
Clad in robes of jade with a faint emerald glow, these enigmatic figures specialize in harnessing the life winds of Qi, striving to suppress the unspeakable desires of their lineage.
